songs.lyrics:
Play me some music
When my money lows
And I don't have no where to go
Play me some music in the ghetto
Whatever problems I have
I'm going to just let go
Play me some music
When Ire arise's
Thank you lord for opeing my eyes
Play me some music
While I take my bath make
Me sing make me laugh
Play me some music while I cook my food
Keep me dancing in a real good mood
Play me some music while I iron my clothes
I can't let down all the fine ass hoes
Play me some music while I was my car
Ride around like a movie star
Play me some music while I make my cash
Selling weed beer and hash
Play me some music while I pimp my hoes
Ride around ?????????????
Play me some music music
Music music music


Play me some music
Play me some music through a hurricane
Give me shelter from the rain
Play me some music when a family member dies
And all I can do is hug and crie
Play me some music when my woman leaves
And all I have is memories
Play me some music when I can't laugh
And IRS takes all I have
When you play me some music for all the illegal stops and eveyone that gets robbed by the cops play me some music while I drink my beers wipe my tears and spread my cheers
Play some music music
Music play me some music music
Music

Haddiesburg Mississippi meber jefferson davis confederate guy used to enslave us  if you don't its cool I went to his elementary school
Pop lockers break dancers rap masters free slaves walkin round with the ghetto blasters whats the hell is that noise the beat boxin preformed by the fat boys I took out the trash I mowed the yard I studied hard got A's on the report card mom and dad at the pad said way to go went to the sto and bought me a radio all you hip hop all you old school vets remember the radio with he two cassettes I shut the door and let the bass boom their's a party in my room

Play me some music
When my money lows
And I don't have no where to go
Play me some music in the ghetto
Whatever problems I have
I'm going to just let go

Playing friends with my friends in a dark blue beam five minutes of funk funk with whodini had fun bumpin Run DMC The cops you better run like me kept buying tapes buit my collection pick my selection BDP Ice Tea Eazy E then one day one day perhaps I thought I would perhaps grab the mice write my own raps   feeling the mic feeling the mic killing the mic killing the mic better then better then any rap you like any rap you lik I got high and then droped out of highschool whats schools cause I got high I got rich fool now I hang with rich fools and their bitch rules when I switch shoes and I never thought I would lose my daily music because of greed more money then what I need indeed oh well what the hell homes turn the beat down and talkin on the cell phone  hang up whos the fuck callin next
If I dont call then I have to text remeber back in the eights all you needs was a pager for the later post Y2K Way more stress cellphone GPS I used to think having cellphones was cool but people wanna call while I'm jammin fool trying to make money fighting with my wife music snuck out my life try to play music when I get the chance gained so much weight I can hardly dance

Play me some music
When my money lows
And I don't have no where to go
Play me some music in the ghetto
Whatever problems I have
I'm going to just let go

Broke out my cd record's MP3's play that play this make me a dope ass play list turn up the bass punk don't be no goof no auxiliary use the bluetooth I live in the woods so don't come around hell no I won't my music down went to best buy and bought a stereo and plug it in to the wall and here we go so if you get a phone call turn it down y'all or take it outside yall I used to play music before I got rich now all I do is talk on the cellphone and fuckin bitch I see you phone call I decline and refuse it fromie don't play that shit

Play me some music
When my money lows
And I don't have no where to go
Play me some music in the ghetto
Whatever problems I have
I'm going to just let go
Play me some music
When Ire arise's
Thank you lord for opeing my eyes
Play me some music
While I take my bath make
Me sing make me laugh
Play me some music while I cook my food
Keep me dancing in a real good mood
Play me some music while I iron my clothes
I can't let down all the fine ass hoes
Play me some music while I was my car
Ride around like a movie star
Play me some music while I make my cash
Selling weed beer and hash
Play me some music while I pimp my hoes
Ride around ?????????????
Play me some music music
Music music music

Play me some music
Play me some music through a hurricane
Give me shelter from the rain
Play me some music when a family member dies
And all I can do is hug and crie
Play me some music when my woman leaves
And all I have is memories
Play me some music when I can't laugh
And IRS takes all I have
When you play me some music for all the illegal stops and eveyone that gets robbed by the cops play me some music while I drink my beers wipe my tears and spread my cheers
Play some music music
Music play me some music music
Music

songs.album: Cold Fro-T-5 And Two Frigg Fraggs
